org.forgerock.openidm.scheduler

Class SchedulerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.scheduler.SchedulerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler

    @Service(value={SchedulerService.class,org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler.class},
         serviceFactory=false)
@Properties(value={@Property(name="service.vendor",value="ForgeRock AS."),@Property(name="service.description",value="Scheduler Service using Quartz"),@Property(name="openidm.router.prefix",value="/scheduler*")})
public class SchedulerService
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler
    Scheduler service using Quartz

      • addSchedule

        public boolean addSchedule(ScheduleConfig scheduleConfig,
                  String jobName,
                  boolean update)
                    throws org.quartz.SchedulerException,
                           ParseException,
                           org.quartz.ObjectAlreadyExistsException
        Schedules a job.
        Parameters:
        scheduleConfig - The schedule configuration
        jobName - The job name
        update - Whether to delete the old job if present
        Returns:
        true if the job was scheduled, false otherwise
        Throws:
        org.quartz.SchedulerException
        ParseException
        org.quartz.ObjectAlreadyExistsException
